sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-text-field
  class="input"
  placeholder="Blocking Issues"
  outline
  solo
  append-icon="mdi-plus-circle-outline"
  multiple prepend-icon="mdi-link-lock"
  @keydown.enter="sendMessage2"
  @click:append="sendMessage2"
  v-model="message2"
  >
  </v-text-field>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name:'Input',
    data:()=>(
        {
            message2:'',
        }
    ),
    methods:{
        sendMessage2()
        {
           if(this.message2 === '') this.message2 ="Blocking Issues"
           this.$emit('message',this.message);
           console.log(this.message2)
           this.message2=''
        }
    }

}
</script>

<style>
.input{
width:100%;
}

</style>
